verbs.description: [ARG1: man] [V: detained] [ARGM-MNR: driving pregnant wife to hospital] was wanted for murder an arrest warrant obtained by the los angeles times lists joel arrona - lara as one of three men wanted for a fatal beating in mexico mr arrona lara mr arrona murder mexico univision maria del carmen venegas
